sections.title: Welcome to Auto HCM & Payroll
sections.subtitle: Streamline Your Workforce Management
sections.name: Hero Section
sections.label: home
sections.content: Welcome to **Auto HCM & Payroll**, your ultimate solution for streamlining human capital management and payroll processes. Experience simplicity, efficiency, and precision today!

images.name: hero-image.jpg
images.description: A dynamic image showing streamlined workforce management.

sections.title: About Us
sections.name: About Auto HCM & Payroll
sections.label: about
sections.content:
**Our Mission**: To empower businesses by simplifying HR and payroll with our innovative, automated solutions. 

**Our Vision**: We envision a future where businesses of all sizes can optimize their workforce management with ease and accuracy.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: Tailored Solutions for Every Business
sections.name: Service Offerings
sections.label: services
sections.content:
- **Automated Payroll Processing**: Ensure accuracy and compliance effortlessly.  
- **Comprehensive HCM System**: Manage your workforce efficiently.  
- **Employee Self-Service Portals**: Empower your staff with easy access to their information.  
- **Advanced Reporting & Analytics**: Gain insights to drive your business forward.

images.name: hcm-system.jpg
images.description: Image showing an overview of the Human Capital Management system.
